entities.name: oceans
entities.description: Oceans are large bodies of saltwater that cover approximately 71% of the Earth"s surface. They play a crucial role in global climate regulation, biodiversity, and human activities such as maritime trade and navigation.

entities.name: system

entities.description: Long-distance travel involves traveling over significant distances, often across continents or oceans.

entities.description: Delivery services involve the transportation of goods from one place to another.

entities.name: Establishing Communities

entities.name: colonization beyond Earth
entities.description: The concept of colonization beyond Earth involves the establishment of human settlements on other celestial bodies, such as the Moon, Mars, and potentially other planets or moons in our solar system. This idea is driven by advancements in space technology and the desire for human exploration and expansion.
